news.title: Updated Android Studio!
news.description: If you're seeing this check out Android Studio 1.2.0 (beta I believe). In addition to logcat they now have realtime CPU & Ram statistics of your apps!

news.title: Meeting Dates
news.description: App club meets at KEC 1007 on Tuesdays & Wednesdays at 6pm

news.title: Hackathon in Spring term
news.description: Google will most likely be sponsoring another hackathon in Spring term, stay posted for more details.
